fusionscene_example.cpp

Nodes should be added to the scene using code simmular to this

00001 void main()
00002 {
00003         //...
00004         FusionScene *scene = new FusionScene();
00005         FusionNode* child = scene->CreateNode();
00006         scene->GetRootNode()->AddChild(child);
00007         //...
00008 }
00009 // OR
00010 void main()
00011 {
00012         //...
00013         FusionScene *scene = new FusionScene();
00014         scene->GetRootNode()->CreateChildNode();
00015         //...
00016 }
